titleStmt.title: The life & death of that renowned John Fisher, Bishop of Rochester comprising the highest and hidden transactions of church and state, in the reign of King Henry the 8th, with divers morall, historicall and political animadversions upon Cardinall Wolsey, Sir Thomas Moor, Martin Luther : with a full relation of Qu. Katharines divorce / carefully selected from severall ancient records by Tho. Baily ...
titleStmt.author: Hall, Richard, 1535 or 6-1604.
Henry VIII, King of England, 1491-1547. Testamentum.
Bayly, Thomas, d. 1657?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Hall. Cf. DNB and BM.
Hall's manuscript was edited and published by Bayly, who implied in the preface that it was his own. Cf. NUC Pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
